SELECT id,fleetId,fleetName,fatherId,company as text,companyNo,address,company,tel FROM t_archives_company
WHERE fleetId =#{fleetId}

SELECT c.*,c.company as text FROM t_archives_company c INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_archives_approve_company WHERE userId = #{userId}) ac ON ac.companyId = c.id OR ac.companyId = c.fatherId
WHERE c.fleetId =#{fleetId}
SELECT *,company as text FROM t_archives_company WHERE fleetId = #{fleetId} AND fatherId = '0'

SELECT id,fleetId,fleetName,fatherId,company,companyNo FROM t_archives_company WHERE 1=1 AND fatherId = '0'
AND fleetId =#{fleetId}

SELECT c.* FROM t_archives_company c INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_archives_approve_company WHERE userId =#{userId} ) ac ON ac.companyId = c.id WHERE 1=1 AND fatherId = '0'
AND c.fleetId =#{fleetId}
